title: Heterobimetallic Ta-Nb MOF offering a moderated Lewis/Br√∏nsted acidity expedites glucose isomerization to fructose under microwave conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01331J, Paper
Sangeeta Mahala, Bhawana Devi, Meera Cheviri, Senthil Murugan Arumugam, Balamurugan Arumugam, Lakshmanan Potturaja, Bakthavachalam Vishnu, Joy K. Roy, Sasikumar Elumalai
Fructose is considered a key intermediate in the preparation of green energy chemicals, especially 5-hydroxymethylfurfural. Herein, we report the highest fructose production using glucose over the heterobimetallic metal-organic framework (MOF)...
